column2: IDEA-132005 fix performance problem in ErrorPaneConfigurable.java

column3: Concatenating string without StringBuilder, as result if user have 2000+ problem and total size of result html string will be more 50mb then "Project structure" panel freeze all.
I wait 30 minutes but ui keep freeze, after very simple patch all work fine

Have you submitted a contributor license agreement? If not, please download the PDF from http://www.jetbrains.org/display/IJOS/Contributor+Agreement and then print it out, sign (mention you github account name there), scan and email to contribute@jetbrains.com
Yes. I already sent a letter with CLA today.
Thanks for the patch. Rewrote and pushed into master. Alarm should work on pooled thread.
IDEA-132005 fix performance problem in ErrorPaneConfigurable.java
